speaker: LEONATO
text: How now, brother, where is my cousin, your

speaker: LEONATO
text: son? Hath he provided this music?

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: He is very busy about it. But,

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: brother, I can tell you strange news that you yet

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: dreamt not of.

speaker: LEONATO
text: Are they good?

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: As the events stamps them, but

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: they have a good cover; they show well outward.

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: The Prince and Count Claudio, walking in a thick-pleached

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: alley in mine orchard, were thus much

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: overheard by a man of mine: the Prince discovered

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: to Claudio that he loved my niece your daughter and

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: meant to acknowledge it this night in a dance, and if

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: he found her accordant, he meant to take the

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: present time by the top and instantly break with you

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: of it.

speaker: LEONATO
text: Hath the fellow any wit that told you this?

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: A good sharp fellow. I will send

speaker:
LEONATO’S
               
              BROTHER
text: for him, and question him yourself.

speaker: LEONATO
text: No, no, we will hold it as a dream till it

speaker: LEONATO
text: appear itself. But I will acquaint my daughter

speaker: LEONATO
text: withal, that she may be the better prepared for an

speaker: LEONATO
text: answer, if peradventure this be true. Go you and tell

speaker: LEONATO
text: her of it.

speaker: LEONATO
text: Cousins, you know what you have to do.—O, I cry

speaker: LEONATO
text: you mercy, friend. Go you with me and I will use

speaker: LEONATO
text: your skill.—Good cousin, have a care this busy

speaker: LEONATO
text: time.
